title: 3D Game-Based Language-Integrated Teaching Methods Workshop for Climate Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic climate science concept comprehension and intermediate-level application skills, scientific text literacy, and foundational writing proficiency required
context.additional_context: A teaching method enhancement course for pre-service and in-service teachers, focusing on smartphone-based 3D game utilization in limited-technology environments. Applies a language-integrated approach emphasizing in-game text analysis and scientific expression training.

learning_goals: Design of text-based instruction linking the 4-stage climate science knowledge domains (solar system-atmosphere-albedo-greenhouse gases) to 3D game activities and development of scientific expression skills
Development of experiential learning scenarios using low-spec 3D interactive games executable on smartphones and enhancement of in-game text analysis capabilities
Creation of game-based assessment tools (observation checklists/portfolios) to improve climate literacy and cultivation of scientific writing skills

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
